text: Stone Carpenter Gossard (born July 2, 1966) is an American musician. He plays the guitar and writes songs for Pearl Jam. He made the band with Eddie Vedder, Jeff Ament, and Mike McCready. He was put in the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2017 for being in Pearl Jam. Gossard is also known for being in other grunge bands before Pearl Jam, such as Mother Love Bone. He was also in Temple of the Dog and Brad. Gossard has also made music by himself. He has released two albums: Bayleaf (2001) and Moonlander (2013). == References == Category:American guitarists Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Pearl Jam
title: Stone Gossard
